title: Copper catalyzed alkaline aerobic lignin depolymerization: effect of botanical origin and industrial extraction process on reactivity supported through characterization
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00144C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Antonio Hernández-Mañas, Alex Martínez-Martin, Johan Madignier, Pascal Fongarland, Frédérique Bertaud, Léa Vilcocq, Laurent Djakovitch
Various lignins were depolymerized to aromatics in basic aqueous media under aerobic catalytic conditions. Emphasis was placed on characterization to explain the results observed. Correlations between structures and reactivity are given.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
